Package DAO

Class customersImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.customersImpl
  • public class customersImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides the ability to manipulate the customers database by adding, selecting, deleting and getting all customers in a list.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<customer> customersList
      List used to store all customers for the program

    • Method Detail

      • selectAllCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<customer> selectAllCustomers()
                                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                                             java.lang.Exception
        Method selects all customers from the customers database.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all customers from the customer table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL error if there is an issue with getting data from SQL database.
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if an error is found.

      • updateCustomerRecord

        public static void updateCustomerRecord​(java.lang.Integer Customer_ID,
                                        java.lang.String customer_Name,
                                        java.lang.String customerAddress,
                                        java.lang.String customerPostalCode,
                                        java.lang.String customerPhone,
                                        java.lang.String last_Updated_By,
                                        java.lang.Integer divisionID)
        Method is called when the user is updating the customer fields, which get updated to the customer's table.
        Parameters:
        Customer_ID - Customer ID from the customer ID field in the update customer method.
        customer_Name - Customer name provided by the user in the update customer method.
        customerAddress - Customer address provided by the user in the update customer method.
        customerPostalCode - Customer Postal code provided by the user in the update customer method.
        customerPhone - Customer Phone number provided by the user in the update customer method.
        last_Updated_By - User name provided by the login class.
        divisionID - Division ID provided by the division combo box in the update customer method.

      • deleteCustomer

        public static void deleteCustomer​(int customerID,
                                  customer selectedCustomer)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method deletes the selected customer from the customer table.
        Parameters:
        customerID - Customer ID provided by the user selecting a record then clicking delete record.
        selectedCustomer - Selected customer deleted from the customer list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL exception error thrown if an error is found.

      • addCustomerRecord

        public static java.lang.String addCustomerRecord​(java.lang.String customer_Name,
                                                 java.lang.String customerAddress,
                                                 java.lang.String customerPostalCode,
                                                 java.lang.String customerPhone,
                                                 java.lang.String createdBy,
                                                 java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                                 java.lang.Integer divisionID)
        Method takes parameters provided by the user and adds a record to the customer table.
        Parameters:
        customer_Name - Customer Name provided by the user and added to the customer table.
        customerAddress - Customer Address provided by the user to be added to the customer table.
        customerPostalCode - Customer Postal Coded provided by the user to be added to the customer table.
        customerPhone - Customer phone number provided by the user to be added to the customer table.
        createdBy - Created by field provided by the login method to track which user adds the record.
        lastUpdatedBy - Last updated field added when the login method provides the user's name.
        divisionID - Division ID number provided when the user selects the country and division in the add customer record table.
        Returns:
        Returns a customer ID number as a string to track the new user's customer number.
